data.text:
BIG NEWS The fog on the Tyne is all Lane7. The toon where it begun for my client Lane7 and the city I went to University. Anecdotally a nightclub that I went to the opening night of c 20 years agoâ€¦.. Lane7 is Newcastle, a local hero and a boy thatâ€™s done good and is doubling up and bringing it to the city centre. There was competition on this one, but there is Bowling operators and then there is Lane7. Property is about relationships and memories, itâ€™s an industry where itâ€™s a marathon not a sprint and the adventures you have along the way, count when the chips are down. Simon Bashford at EYCO representing The Crown Estate was a champion, itâ€™s the second deal I have done with EYCO with the Lane7 group having put Level X into St. Enoch Centre which has had a phenomenal impact on footfall, I expect the same here. Will Hodge and Michael Thomas at The Crown Estate were fantastic to deal with and I look forward to doing more. This one was special for many reasons; a city that is very close to my heart, where it all began for Lane7 and finally good friends involved, if Carlberg did agency deals this is up there. Lane7 owns the toon. Howay the Lads! #NEWCASTLE #RETAIL #FANDB #BETTERTHANTHEREST #RESTAURANT #THEFUTUREISHERE #LEISURE #COMPETITIVESOCIALISING #ROLLINGTHEDICE #DEVELOPMENT #AGENCY #RESTAURANTAGENT #LEISUREAGENT #RETAILAGENT #POSITIVITY #TORRIDON #CHOOSELIFE #CHOOSENOTTOCHOOSEANYTHINGOTHERTHANLIFE #CHOOSETORRIDON

LAFC's global influence: A deep dive into their expanding football empire Los Angeles Football Club (LAFC) are making waves in the global football scene, expanding their reach far beyond Major League Soccer. With the recent acquisition of Grasshopper Club ZÃ¼rich, they've added another prestigious club to their portfolio - adding them to an ownership group that includes an Austrian team and a joint venture with FC Bayern MÃ¼nchen. This move is part of a larger strategy that spans 14 countries and includes partnerships with major clubs. Let's dive into what makes this development significant and its broader implications for the football world. 1: What does LAFC's acquisition of FC Grasshopper Zurich signify? LAFC's purchase of FC Grasshopper marks a significant expansion of their global football network. This acquisition not only adds Switzerland's most storied club to their portfolio but also highlights LAFC's ambition to create a diverse and extensive global football presence. 2: How extensive is LAFC's global football network? LAFC's ownership consortium has ties to 24 clubs worldwide, spanning 14 countries. These include partnerships and direct ownership ties with clubs like FC Internazionale Milano, Club AtlÃ©tico de Madrid, Chelsea Football Club, Crystal Palace Football Club, and Olympique Lyonnais Groupe. Their reach extends across continents, from Uruguay to the USA and Gambia to Germany. 3: What are the potential implications of LAFC's expansive ownership model? The complex web of LAFC's ownership raises questions about sporting integrity and the future of football club ownership. It reflects the growing trend of multi-club ownership (MCOs) and private equity investment in football, posing challenges to governing bodies in maintaining the integrity of competitions. 4: How does LAFC's strategy differ from traditional football club ownership models? Unlike traditional MCO models where European clubs often lead, LAFC seems to be at the pinnacle of their structure. This suggests a shift in management and player flow, potentially indicating a future where the influence of non-European entities, including the US, becomes more pronounced in global football. ðŸ’¡ Learn more: To delve deeper into LAFC's expanding influence in the football world, explore the detailed analysis by Off The Pitch. Interview with Nic Hamer from Oakwell Sports Advisory #Partnership #SportsBusiness #Commercial #Football #SportsBiz #Finance #People #Data #Tech #Intelligence #Investment
